title: Fire fuels
creator_credit: Media World and Victoria. Country Fire Authority
brief_description: The video acknowledges that three major factors affect bushfire behaviour. They are weather, topography and fuel. The impact of fuel in fire is examined. Find out what fuels are both in the bush and in an industrial setting. Implications are mainly for the rural fire fighter.
